enb_long_title: United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change: Twenty-Second Session of the Subsidiary Bodies
section_title: Internal Review of the Activities of the Secretariat
sentences: Joke Waller-Hunter reported on an interim review of the Secretariats activities (FCCC/SBI/2005/6), noting a lack of resources to meet demands, and inviting guidance from Parties.
Harald Dovland (Norway) will chair a contact group.
